name: Child Of War
description:
Child Of War

[OBS!!! 

lots of bugs and other problems like not beign able to play in browser and a whole level missing from the game atm, this will all be fixed within a month from now hopefully. sorry. if the game breaks please just reastart it, we are aweare of the state of the game and are working on fixing it.]

Set in a dystopian urban area Child Of War is a stealth platformer where you and your younger sibling are forced to traverse the raging war alone to find safety
